job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are looking for a Senior Front-End Engineer for our Personalization and Recommendations team.

   The Personalization and Recommendations has the mission to allow our marketplaces to improve the buying experience by understanding our users and surfacing inspirational content. We build search and discovery solutions, we have recommender systems and user modelling products and are currently building a conversational search solution.

   What you'll do

   Your role in the team is to develop the frontend of a completely new product: Conversational Search. The product is meant to help our users find the goods on our websites easier. It leverages technologies like generative AI and Large Language Models (LLMs). Having an all-knowing assistant at your disposal can change the way our users interact with our websites completely.
job_details.full_text:
Senior Front-End Engineer

We are looking for a Senior Front-End Engineer for our Personalization and Recommendations team.

   The Personalization and Recommendations has the mission to allow our marketplaces to improve the buying experience by understanding our users and surfacing inspirational content. We build search and discovery solutions, we have recommender systems and user modelling products and are currently building a conversational search solution.

   What you'll do

   Your role in the team is to develop the frontend of a completely new product: Conversational Search. The product is meant to help our users find the goods on our websites easier. It leverages technologies like generative AI and Large Language Models (LLMs). Having an all-knowing assistant at your disposal can change the way our users interact with our websites completely.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on a Senior Front-End Engineer role, emphasizing the development of user-facing interfaces for a conversational search product. While it mentions the use of generative AI and LLMs as underlying technologies, the core responsibilities and required skills are centered around front-end development, not the design, training, or deep integration of AI models themselves. The role is primarily about building the user experience around AI, rather than building the AI systems. Therefore, it does not fit the core definitions of ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer, which require a deeper focus on model development, MLOps, or AI system architecture.

job_tasks.justification: The role explicitly states 'develop the frontend of a completely new product: Conversational Search' and 'help our users find the goods on our websites easier', which are core software development activities focused on user-facing applications.
job_tasks.phrase: develop the frontend of a completely new product: Conversational Search

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions building the user experience for a product that 'leverages technologies like generative AI and Large Language Models (LLMs)', indicating the integration of AI features into a software product.
job_tasks.phrase: build the frontend of a completely new product

job_tasks.justification: The team's mission is 'to allow our marketplaces to improve the buying experience by understanding our users and surfacing inspirational content', which directly relates to understanding business goals and user needs to drive technical solutions.
job_tasks.phrase: improve the buying experience by understanding our users and surfacing inspirational content
